TopicTitle: The "F3" key used to go both ways?

Articles.Content: When I fly a plane or rocket I can press "F3", then the game pauses and shows the "Flight Results" screen. I think I used to press "F3" again to hide "Flight Results" and unpause the game. Now I must click "Close" with the mouse. Maybe there is a setting somewhere that I messed up? More to the point, does your v. 1.1.3 (x64) behave like this too?
Not answering, but I don't know how else to subscribe to the thread so I'll see the answer sooner rather than later.
